ew-extension.name: DateTimePicker
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Bootstrap Date/Time Picker Developer Website: https://tempusdominus.github.io/bootstrap-4/ Bootstrap Date/Time Picker is available under MIT License.
Notes: 1. Bootstrap Date/Time Picker uses Moment: http://momentjs.com 2. Format syntax: http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying 3. Locale files: https://github.com/moment/moment/tree/develop/locale 4. Language ID of language file must match the locale file name without extension. If Moment does not have locale file for the language, you need to create it yourself. 5. Options should be in JSON syntax: https://tempusdominus.github.io/bootstrap-4/Options/
Options: - Options (Global, applies to all fields) - InputGroup (Show the input as Bootstrap input group) - Options (Field-specific)
Note: The Bootstrap Date/Time Picker is not part of PHPMaker. Please read "Third-Party Tools" in the help file.
